short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension which supports your tasks on Merch By Amazon (Amazon Merch on Demand)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Amazon Merch on Demand journey with the MerchSpark Chrome extension! Watch your daily sales on the beautiful sales dashboard.

★ Sales Dashboard
✔ view your sales on the sales widgts
✔ daily sales graph with sales per marketplace

★ Get Notifications
✔ audio notifications on new sales and returns
✔ text notifications on new sales, returns and cancelled products
✔ sales badge in your browser

★ Safety
✔ All sales and design data is stored and processed safely inside your private Chrome browser
✔ Icongnito mode to share your screen safely with others without revealing design information


Disclaimer: This is not an official plugin of Merch by Amazon or Amazon. There may be unexpected changes to the platform, which may cause the plugin to fail.

Please contact us if you notice any problems with the extension.
